means: 涌出( pour的第三人称单数 )
point-of-use replenishment system 现场补充系统

sentence.Network_en: The railway station pours thousands of people in all directions.
sentence.Network_cn: 成千上万的人从火车站走向四面八方.

sentence.Network_en: Thick liquid pours much more slowly than thin liquid.
sentence.Network_cn: 稠的液体倒出来比稀的慢.

entry.tran: 使（液体等）连续流出；倾倒；倒出
entry.def: If you pour a liquid or other substance, you make it flow steadily out of a container by holding the container at an angle.

example.ex: Pour a pool of sauce on two plates and arrange the meat neatly...
example.tran: 在两个盘子里倒少许沙司酱，然后把肉摆放整齐。

example.ex: Francis poured a generous measure of the whisky into a fresh glass...
example.tran: 弗朗西斯往一个干净的玻璃杯里倒了很多威士忌。

entry.def: If you pour someone a drink, you put some of the drink in a cup or glass so that they can drink it.

example.ex: He got up and poured himself another drink...
example.tran: 他站起身来，给自己又倒了一杯。

example.ex: She asked Tillie to pour her a cup of coffee...
example.tran: 她请蒂莉给她倒杯咖啡。

entry.def: When a liquid or other substance pours somewhere, for example through a hole, it flows quickly and in large quantities.

example.ex: Blood was pouring from his broken nose...
example.tran: 血从他受伤的鼻子里涌出来。

example.ex: There was dense smoke pouring from all four engines...

entry.def: When it rains very heavily, you can say that it is pouring.

example.ex: It has been pouring in Delhi almost non stop for the past three days, disrupting normal life...
example.tran: 德里市在过去的3天里一直在下着倾盆大雨，几乎没有停过，扰乱了人们的正常生活。

example.ex: It has been pouring with rain all week...
example.tran: 一个星期以来一直在下着瓢泼大雨。

entry.def: If people pour into or out of a place, they go there quickly and in large numbers.

example.ex: Any day now, the Northern forces may pour across the new border...
example.tran: 北方的军队现在随时都可能大批越过新边界。

example.ex: Holidaymakers continued to pour down to the coast in search of surf and sun...
example.tran: 度假者不断涌至海边冲浪和享受阳光。

entry.def: If something such as information pours into a place, a lot of it is obtained or given.

example.ex: Martin, 78, died yesterday. Tributes poured in from around the globe...
example.tran: 马丁于昨天去世，享年78岁。世界各地的人们纷纷致以哀悼。

example.ex: The commission has invited interested parties to submit comments, and these are now pouring in.
example.tran: 委员会已邀请各当事方递交意见，现在意见书纷至沓来。

entry.def: If someone pours cold water on a plan or idea, they criticize it so much that people lose their enthusiasm for it.

example.ex: The education secretary poured cold water on the recommendations of a working party.
example.tran: 教育大臣对一个工作小组的建议泼冷水。

auth_sentence.res_content: The sun pours in through the big bay window.

auth_sentence.res_content: He pours red lemonade into a cup for me.
